tasks.intent_template: Create a draft email with subject '{subject}', content '{content}', and recipient '{recipient}'
tasks.reference_action_sequence:
from playground.desktop_env.eval.connectors.gspace.gmail import GmailService
service = GmailService()
created_draft_id = service.create_draft(subject='Automated draft', recipient='gduser@workspacesamples.dev', content='This is automated draft mail')

tasks.intent_template: Send a email with subject '{subject}', content '{content}', and recipient '{recipient}'
tasks.reference_action_sequence:
from playground.desktop_env.eval.connectors.gspace.gmail import GmailService
service = GmailService()
sent_email_id = service.send_message(subject='Automated Email',recipient='gduser1@workspacesamples.dev',content='This is automatically sent email')
